summary: Created comprehensive new sections for the homepage: 1) About Us section with animated construction elements (placeholder for Lottie), typography effects, and Material UI-inspired design; 2) Explorer section showcasing Rajshahi experiences with 3D animations and interactive cards; 3) Partners section displaying trusted organizations with hover effects and animated logos. All sections follow the bland/neutral design theme with gray backgrounds, subtle animations, and clean typography. The homepage now has a complete flow: Hero Slider → About Us → Projects → Explorer → Testimonials → Partners.
current_status: The homepage now includes all requested sections with sophisticated animations and Material UI-inspired design. The About Us section features animated construction elements and gradient typography. The Explorer section showcases local experiences with 3D card animations. The Partners section displays trusted organizations with interactive hover effects. All sections maintain the neutral color scheme and include smooth scroll-triggered animations. The page structure is now complete and ready for use.
